inclusion.criterion: Infants under the age of 1 year, pre-continent, before walking
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: For whom an urine sample is required for the diagnosis of a urinary tract infection,
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Obtaining the authorization by one of the two parents or the holder of parental authority
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Affiliation to a national social security scheme
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Do exhibiting signs of vital distress
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Withdrawal of informed consent by parents or holders of parental authority
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: External genitalia or urinary tract malformation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 62 yo male with hx of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter with multiple prior admissions for UTIs, altered mental status, and urosepsis. Started on ditropan changed over to detrol.
